results.idea: Conservative accounting signal — falling receivables doubtful (recd) relative to receivables
results.description: Used fnd6_recd (receivables estimated doubtful) and receivable (SUGGESTION1). ts_backfill applied (SUGGESTION3). Both fields have notable userCounts (SUGGESTION4). Implementation concise. Confidence: 0.5

results.idea: Sustained sales growth with low capital intensity — sales_growth / capex
results.description: Combined sales_growth and capex (SUGGESTION1). ts_backfill applied (SUGGESTION3). Chosen fields have reasonable userCounts (SUGGESTION4). Implementation short. Confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Improving cashflow margin normalized by enterprise value (valuation aware)
results.description: Used cashflow and enterprise_value (SUGGESTION1). ts_backfill applied (SUGGESTION3). High userCount fields (SUGGESTION4). Implementation concise. Confidence: 0.76

results.idea: Declining pension adjustments — fewer legacy expenses
results.description: Used fnd6_eventv110_pncdq / related pension fields; used single pension-related field when available and ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). Low userCount fields used cautiously (SUGGESTION4 notes limited confidence). Implementation short. Confidence: 0.45

results.idea: Rising operating income while shares repurchased — EPS leverage plus buybacks
results.description: Combined operating_income and fnd6_newqeventv110_cshopq (shares repurchased) (SUGGESTION1). ts_backfill applied (SUGGESTION3). Implementation concise and within limits. Confidence: 0.63

results.idea: High capex but falling PP&E — suspicious write-downs or disposals
results.description: Compared capex and ppent using ts_delta with backfill (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION1 used two fields. This is a cautionary/short signal; moderate confidence due to complexity. Confidence: 0.48

results.idea: Sales growth outlier mean reversion — ts_quantile of sales_growth
results.description: Applied ts_quantile to sales_growth with ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION1 single field. sales_growth has high userCount (SUGGESTION4). Implementation uses one operator plus backfill. Confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Cashflow stability vs market — low ts_std_dev of cashflow divided by enterprise value
results.description: Combined ts_std_dev on cashflow and enterprise_value (two-field ratio). Applied ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). Both fields widely used (SUGGESTION4). Implementation short. Confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Improving net income with falling tax — net margin after tax expanding
results.description: Used fnd6_newa2v1300_ni (net income) and income_tax (SUGGESTION1). Applied ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). Fields have reasonable userCounts (SUGGESTION4). Implementation concise. Confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Falling deferred revenue long-term — recognizing backlog
results.description: Used fnd6_newqeventv110_drltq (deferred revenue long-term) single-field with ts_delta and ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION4 moderate userCount. Implementation short. Confidence: 0.52

results.idea: Rising operating_income while EV declines — earnings recovery mispriced by market
results.description: Combined operating_income and enterprise_value (SUGGESTION1). ts_backfill applied (SUGGESTION3). Both are high userCount (SUGGESTION4). Implementation fits constraints. Confidence: 0.74

results.idea: Improving gross profit while receivables fall — quality revenue
results.description: Used gross profit and receivable (SUGGESTION1). ts_backfill applied (SUGGESTION3). Implementation concise and two-field limited. Confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Low market value to invested capital — potential undervaluation
results.description: Combined enterprise_value and invested_capital (SUGGESTION1). Applied ts_backfill to both (SUGGESTION3). Both have strong userCounts (SUGGESTION4). Implementation compact. Confidence: 0.7

results.idea: Improving operating income vs depreciation — margin improvement excluding noncash charges
results.description: Used operating_income and depre_amort (SUGGESTION1). ts_backfill applied (SUGGESTION3). Implementation concise and within operator/datafield limits. Confidence: 0.58
